verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come let us sing unto the Lord
let us make a joyful noise to the rock of our salvation
come let us sing unto the Lord
Let us come before his presence with thanksgiving in our hearts

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
For the Lord is a great God
and a great king over all gods
in his hands are the land and the sea
for the lord is a great god
and a great king over allgods
in the beauty of his sanctuary
we know his strength and majesty
for the lord he is a great god
